topics.body:
Good news today: I hit the freaking jackpot in the vending machine today

I got two bags of Cheez-Its for the price of one. I almost got none, because the first time it tried to dispense the bag, it didn't fall down. I guess the machine is programmed to keep trying until something happens, because it tried a second time, and it fell along with the one behind it that also got pushed along.

So that makes up for anything that's happened earlier today.

topics.body:
So that hostage situation in Australia ended and the police stormed the cafe; two people died.  It could have ended a lot worse.  For those of you out of the know basically a standalone ISIS supporter in Sydney held up a cafe.

Australia has actually reacted fairly positively to this and a lot of them have come out in support of Muslims realizing that just cause someone's Muslim doesn't mean they're a terrorist and a lot of them are doing this "I'llridewithyou" trend.

#inb4Whatevs
